about_the_game:
I don't want to go to work, I don't want to go to work, I don't want to go to work!

Winter is here, and it's even harder to survive in the workplace. Are the seemingly friendly colleagues actually plotting against me? Are the leaders and bosses making unreasonable demands every day? Do I have to take on a lot of work with a meager salary? I don't want to go to work!!! I don't want to go to work anymore!!! Go to the company right away and "blow up" your colleagues and leaders, and use the various work and life skills you have learned to survive in the cruel workplace battle!!!

"Last P Class" is a 2D top-down survival action game. The gameplay is simple, easy and refreshing, and contains a small amount of Roguelite elements. In the game, you can choose a large number of characters working in a certain game company. Their positions give them special combat abilities. By surviving in the workplace, you can get more weapons and skills to become more powerful, and defeat all colleagues and leaders who want to harm you, even the big boss behind the scenes!!!

Colleagues and leaders in the entire company are enemies! ?

A two-faced backstabber? A leader who only knows how to flatter? A white lotus who only blames others when something goes wrong? A giant baby who wants the whole world to serve him? A roll king who pretends to work until the early morning every day? In the game, you will face dozens of annoying colleagues in the workplace. They are countless and have different abilities. Use all the abilities you have to sweep these enemies! !

In addition to countless colleagues who will obstruct you, as long as you grow to a certain level, you may have the opportunity to meet more troublesome guys, such as "leaders" and "bosses"? Hypocritical pie-in-the-sky masters, terrifying PUA maniacs, dictators who have the final say, smiling tigers with knives hidden in their smiles, and even "emperors" who are above everything else will eventually appear in front of you, and they are more difficult to deal with than ordinary colleagues. In the game, you will encounter more than a dozen or even more BOSSes, and they will do their best to deal with you, the growing "thorn".

Or is it best to use common things to hit people! ?

What do you use most often at work? Mouse, keyboard, or drinking water cup, etc., here, they are your most handy weapons. The game provides more than a dozen different initial weapons, and as the game progresses, you can transform them in various ways to greatly enhance their capabilities, and even show completely different forms and functions. Each weapon has different evolutionary branches, and maybe you can transform the keyboard into something strange...?

This is what you have to do when working in a game company! ?

Dog planners take your life! But in a game company, positions are not just divided by planning, programming, and art. In the game, you will be able to use forty (or more) different positions. Characters have completely different passive traits and initial skills, and the playing experience of each character is completely different! Although you can only start from the initial position, you can gradually unlock more available positions as the game progresses. The mysterious positions in the game company are about to be revealed? A variety of positions are waiting for you to discover. It is not impossible to play a middle-level and management position, and even an administrative position is not a problem. Is it a cleaning lady...

Although I don’t want to learn, it seems to be very useful! ?

Weapons alone are not enough to defeat the enemy! To defeat the enemy, you must understand the enemy. It is not that you cannot learn to blame others or yell at others, but you just don’t want to learn because you are too ashamed. But now that things have come to this, there is nothing you can do! You can learn dozens of different skills in the game. In addition to learning and upgrading skills, you may get the effect of 1+1 greater than 2 through combination. There are many unscrupulous means commonly seen in the workplace, but in order to survive in the workplace, you must learn! Repeated learning of skills seems to bring unexpected additional effects, and the ability of a specific combination may become a new skill...?

Make good use of the weekend to make yourself stronger to survive in the workplace! ?

As long as you stick to it for a week, you can come to the weekend. The rare quiet time, should you use it to relax or roll up quickly? You can enter the weekend after each round of battle in the game, and you can enjoy your free time! ! ! Should you open your mobile phone to shop or modify your weapons, or study books to learn skills, or go out for a good meal or shopping with friends, or even just sleep in, and allocate actions reasonably to strengthen yourself. By the way, there is a special "partner" at home. You may have good luck if you get along well with it?

Talents of game companies who have developed to a certain extent! ?

Do you want to specialize or develop comprehensively? Different strategies make the game process different. As long as you learn skills, you can improve five abilities: creativity, aesthetics, logic, workplace and life. Each ability will bring completely different special mechanisms and effects when it reaches different levels, which greatly affects the overall combat and strengthening strategy. All-rounders and specialized bosses have their own ways to deal with various crises!

Life is a combination of countless accidents?

The weather forecast shows that it will rain heavily next week? I heard from my colleagues that a new leader will be airdropped next week? I was late for work due to traffic jams? There was a sudden power outage in the park? The company suddenly notified that it would start a big and small week or 996 overtime next week? The price of pork suddenly increased? As the game progresses, special events may be triggered every week, affecting the situation and direction of the entire battle, but the arrival of unexpected events may not necessarily be a bad thing? Well, when the enemy comes, the general will stop it; when the water comes, the earth will cover it. A life full of randomness is exciting enough. Life is like absenteeism, no, the wilderness.
